help.quick_start.title: Quick Start Guide
help.quick_start.subtitle: Get started in 3 simple steps
help.quick_start.step1.title: Select Your PDF
help.quick_start.step1.desc: Click 'Browse Files' or drag and drop your PDF document into the upload area.
help.quick_start.step2.title: Review Analysis
help.quick_start.step2.desc: The application will automatically detect all table titles and identify which ones need modification.
help.quick_start.step3.title: Apply Changes
help.quick_start.step3.desc: Choose your formatting preferences and click 'Apply Modifications' to save the corrected PDF.
help.features.title: Key Features
help.features.subtitle: What makes this tool special
help.features.auto_detect.title: Automatic Detection
help.features.auto_detect.desc: Automatically finds all table titles in your PDF document, even across multiple pages.
help.features.apa_compliant.title: APA Compliant
help.features.apa_compliant.desc: Ensures your table titles follow APA 7th edition formatting standards for multi-page tables.
help.features.format_preserve.title: Format Preservation
help.features.format_preserve.desc: Option to keep original formatting or customize font, size, bold, and italic styles.
help.features.fast.title: Fast Processing
help.features.fast.desc: Quick analysis and modification of large PDF documents with multiple tables.
help.format_options.title: Format Options
help.format_options.subtitle: Understanding formatting controls
help.format_options.keep_original.title: Keep Original Format
help.format_options.keep_original.desc: When enabled, preserves the exact formatting (font, size, style) of the original table titles. This option is only available when all detected tables have uniform formatting.
help.format_options.font.title: Font Family
help.format_options.font.desc: Choose from common academic fonts: Times New Roman, Arial, Calibri, Helvetica, Verdana, or Courier New.
help.format_options.size.title: Font Size
help.format_options.size.desc: Select the font size in points (pt). Common sizes for academic documents are 10, 11, or 12 pt.
help.format_options.bold.title: Bold & Italic
help.format_options.bold.desc: Toggle bold and italic styles for table titles. These options work independently and can be combined.
help.troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting
help.troubleshooting.subtitle: Common issues and solutions
help.troubleshooting.no_tables.title: No Tables Detected
help.troubleshooting.no_tables.desc: Ensure your PDF contains tables with titles in the format 'Table X' or 'Cuadro X' followed by a description. The titles must be on separate lines.
help.troubleshooting.format_not_detected: If format detection fails, you can still customize the formatting manually using the format options. The 'Keep original format' checkbox will be disabled.
help.troubleshooting.large_file.title: Large File Processing
help.troubleshooting.large_file.desc: For very large PDFs (50MB+), processing may take longer. The application will show progress updates during analysis.
help.troubleshooting.save_issues.title: Save File Issues
help.troubleshooting.save_issues.desc: Make sure you have write permissions in the output directory. The application will create a new file with '_fixed' suffix.
help.tips.title: Tips & Best Practices
help.tips.subtitle: Get the most out of the application
help.tips.backup.title: Always Backup
help.tips.backup.desc: Keep a backup of your original PDF before applying modifications. The application creates a new file, but it's good practice to have backups.
help.tips.review.title: Review Before Applying
help.tips.review.desc: Check the analysis results and preview the format before clicking 'Apply Modifications' to ensure everything looks correct.
help.tips.apa_guide.title: APA Guidelines
help.tips.apa_guide.desc: For multi-page tables, APA 7th edition requires titles to include page numbering: 'Table X. Title (1/3)', 'Table X. Title (2/3)', etc.
help.tips.history.title: Track Changes
help.tips.history.desc: Use the 'Changes' section to view a history of all modifications made to your documents, including details about what was changed.
